segment.source: Preparing a Computer for Manual Driver Deployment
segment.target: Preparing a Computer for Manual Driver Deployment

segment.source: You can deploy a driver automatically or manually.
segment.target: You can deploy a driver automatically or manually.

segment.source: In either case, you need to prepare the target computer first.
segment.target: In either case, you need to prepare the target computer first.

segment.source: Here we describe how to prepare the target computer if you choose to deploy your driver manually.
segment.target: Here we describe how to prepare the target computer if you choose to deploy your driver manually.

segment.source: Typically the computer where you install and test a driver is separate from the computer where you develop and build the driver package.
segment.target: Typically the computer where you install and test a driver is separate from the computer where you develop and build the driver package.

segment.source: The computer where you build the driver is called the host computer, and the computer where you install and test the driver is called the target computer or the test computer.
segment.target: The computer where you build the driver is called the host computer, and the computer where you install and test the driver is called the target computer or the test computer.

segment.source: The process of moving the driver package to the target computer and installing the driver it is called deploying the driver.
segment.target: The process of moving the driver package to the target computer and installing the driver it is called deploying the driver.

segment.source: On the target computer, open a Command Prompt window as Administrator.
segment.target: On the target computer, open a Command Prompt window as Administrator.

segment.source: Enter bcdedit /set TESTSIGNING ON.
segment.target: Enter bcdedit /set TESTSIGNING ON.

segment.source: Reboot the target computer.
segment.target: Reboot the target computer.

segment.source: Copy the DevCon tool to a folder on the target computer (for example, c:\\Tools).
segment.target: Copy the DevCon tool to a folder on the target computer (for example, c:\\Tools).

segment.source: The DevCon tool is included in the Windows Driver Kit (WDK).
segment.target: The DevCon tool is included in the Windows Driver Kit (WDK).

segment.source: You can find it under the Tools directory (for example, C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Windows Kits\\8.1\\Tools\\x64\\devcon.exe).
segment.target: You can find it under the Tools directory (for example, C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Windows Kits\\8.1\\Tools\\x64\\devcon.exe).

segment.source: Create or get a certificate file that you can install on the target computer.
segment.target: Create or get a certificate file that you can install on the target computer.

segment.source: For example, suppose you have used Microsoft Visual Studio to build the RAMDisk Storage Driver sample in the code gallery.
segment.target: For example, suppose you have used Microsoft Visual Studio to build the RAMDisk Storage Driver sample in the code gallery.

segment.source: The build process creates a certificate (.cer) file.
segment.target: The build process creates a certificate (.cer) file.

segment.source: The location of the certificate file varies depending on what you have specified for configuration and platform.
segment.target: The location of the certificate file varies depending on what you have specified for configuration and platform.

segment.source: For the RAMDisk sample, if your configuration is Win7 Debug and your platform is x64, then the certificate file, xx.cer, is in your solution folder under C++\\x64\\Win7Debug.
segment.target: For the RAMDisk sample, if your configuration is Win7 Debug and your platform is x64, then the certificate file, xx.cer, is in your solution folder under C++\\x64\\Win7Debug.

segment.source: Copy the certificate file to a folder on your target computer (for example c:\\Certificates).
segment.target: Copy the certificate file to a folder on your target computer (for example c:\\Certificates).

segment.source: On the target computer, right click the certificate file, and choose Install.
segment.target: On the target computer, right click the certificate file, and choose Install.

segment.source: Work through the installation wizard.
segment.target: Work through the installation wizard.

segment.source: When you build one of the WDK gallery samples, the build process creates a test-signing certificate.
segment.target: When you build one of the WDK gallery samples, the build process creates a test-signing certificate.

segment.source: You need to install a test-signing certificate only once.
segment.target: You need to install a test-signing certificate only once.

segment.source: If you have installed a certificate from a WDK gallery sample, you can install other gallery samples without installing a certificate again.
segment.target: If you have installed a certificate from a WDK gallery sample, you can install other gallery samples without installing a certificate again.
